snippet: As traders locked in recent gains, the Dow, S.&P. 500 and Nasdaq composite had their largest daily losses since Nov. 7.
abstract: Stock market posts its largest drop in more than a month as traders lock in recent gains.
lead_paragraph: As traders locked in recent gains, the Dow, S.&P. 500 and Nasdaq composite had their largest daily losses since Nov. 7.

headline.main: In a Year of Major Gains, Markets Take a Big Tumble
headline.print_headline: In a Year of Major Gains, Markets Take a Big Tumble
